posts.title: WEB APPS PROJECT
posts.text: Exploring different tools for developing Java based web apps/services/apis. Servlet, JAX-RS, SpringMVC, Struts2, Spark....

posts.title: DATA SCRAPER 2
posts.text: Basic data / screen scraper from a bookstore website. Done with BeautifulSoup.

posts.title: DATA SCRAPER
posts.text: Basic data / screen scraper from a bookstore website. Done with Jsoup.

posts.title: BASIC WEB API
posts.text: Simple RESTful API. Built with Django REST.

posts.title: SOCIAL NETWORK CONCEPT
posts.text: Just a basic idea / concept that is on hold for now. Really not much done.

posts.title: SOKOBAN GAME
posts.text: On hold for now. It's a classic Sokoban-like game. Some basic things (mapping,drawing,moving...) are done.

posts.title: EMPLOYEE MANAGEMENT 2
posts.text: A bit enhanced version with nicer GUI and ORM done with Hibernate.

posts.title: EMPLOYEE MANAGEMENT 1
posts.text: Simple employee management system.

posts.title: RESTFUL WEB SERVICE
posts.text: Basic concept of RESTful web service for translating between two languages. Built with JAX-RS.

posts.title: WEB BROWSER
posts.text: A simple web browser. There is a lot more to play with. Built with JavaFX.

posts.title: WEATHER APP
posts.text: Simple weather app. Built with JavaFX. Powered by OpenWeatherMap API.

posts.title: PUZZLE GAME
posts.text: Simple, one-level puzzle game done with Swing. Needs a few more tweaks but it's functional, nice and I'm happy.

posts.title: INTERNET PACKAGE SALES
posts.text: It's a form for registering the sales of internet packages.Done with JavaFX.

posts.title: BASIC ANGULAR APP
posts.text: Just a real basic AngularJS stuff.

posts.title: SIMPLE MAIL CLIENT
posts.text: It can read newest text mail and send one. Simple as that. Built with JavaFX.

posts.title: TEXT ENCODER / DECODER
posts.text: Just for fun. String encoding/decoding. Done with JavaFX.

posts.title: LITTLE CLIENT-SERVER APP
posts.text: Little c/s app with an ugly gui. But it's a nice multithread / socket / awt exercise.

posts.title: TIMER APP
posts.text: Simple but interesting Swing exercise .

posts.title: SIMPLE FILE MANAGER APP
posts.text: Very simple console based file manager application. Just an exercise for file system handling.

posts.title: BASIC XML PARSER
posts.text: Basic XPath XML parser.

posts.title: WEB WEATHER APP

posts.text: Ugly, unfinished web weather app. Done with SpringMVC. Powered by OpenWeatherMap API.

posts.title: WEB SHOP APP
posts.text: I am really not proud of this one. It was my first Spring MVC attempt and it was just a basic exercise with bad UI.
